tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE debtors (
  debtor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  debtor_name VARCHAR(255),
  debt_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  payment_status VARCHAR(50),
  aging_days INT
)

CREATE TABLE debtors (
  debtor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  debtor_name VARCHAR(255),
  debt_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  payment_status VARCHAR(50),
  aging INT
);

CREATE TABLE payment_history (
  payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  debtor_id INT,
  payment_date DATE,
  amount_paid DECIMAL(10, 2),
  payment_status VARCHAR(50)
);
CREATE TABLE Debtors ( debtor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, debtor_name VARCHAR(50), debt_amount DECIMAL(10, 2), payment_status VARCHAR(20), aging INT );
CREATE TABLE PaymentHistory ( payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, debtor_id INT, payment_date DATE, payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2), payment_method VARCHAR(20) );
CREATE TABLE DebtorSegments ( segment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, segment_name VARCHAR(50), criteria_description TEXT );
CREATE TABLE StrategyPlans ( plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY, segment_id INT, strategy_description TEXT, target_action TEXT );

CREATE TABLE debtors (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  debt_amount DECIMAL,
  payment_status VARCHAR,
  aging INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE payments (
  payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  debtor_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL,
  payment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE strategies (
  strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR,
  target_group VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE profiles (
  profile_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  debtor_id INT,
  strategy_id INT,
  segment VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE aging (
  aging_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  days INTEGER,
  description VARCHAR
)
